name: Somewhere in the Shadow
description:
Somewhere in the Shadow
This is a multiplayer co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Solve all puzzles to escape the prison of the mysterious house. The residents of the house will block your way out. Try to avoid them and help your mates if they messed up or got into trouble.

Co-op for 4 players
Play with your friends and have fun together. It is real joy to see your friend frightened by a screamer and it is more interesting to resolve riddles together.

Singleplayer
Face all difficulties on your own and escape this cursed place.
